data.title: Summer 2023 IMPACT – Relentless Obedience to God by Regent University
data.meta_description:
Highlights from this issue include:
•Letter from the Chairman: Phillip D. Walker, the Chairman of Regent University’s Board of Trustees
•Relentless...
data.text: Highlights from this issue include: •Letter from the Chairman: Phillip D. Walker, the Chairman of Regent University’s Board of Trustees •Relentless Obedience: Regent’s Founder, Chancellor, and CEO Dr. M.G. “Pat” Robertson received his heavenly reward on June 8, 2023. Our cover story shares how unyielding faith and trust in the Lord guided his life and legacy. •More than Conquerors: Regent University's 43rd Commencement ceremony featured GOP presidential candidate and keynote speaker Nikki Haley •A Dream Fulfilled: CBN News Senior International Correspondent and Co-Anchor George Thomas (SCA ’95) is Regent’s 2023 Alumnus of the Year. •Meet Eight “Inspiring Graduates”: These men and women from the Class of 2023 have been equipped as Christian leaders ready to change the world. •The 2023 Chancellor’s Award: Regent Law Associate Dean and Professor S. Ernie Walton •Alumni World Changer: Regent’s School of Divinity honored Brian and Valerie Britton (SOD ’03 & ’04)
